title: Shaolin - Soccer - DVDrip
description:
This torrent contains an ISO-file/DVDrip of the movie Shaolin Soccer.

Its the english version with subtitles for Swedish, Norwegian, Danish and Finnish.

It is very easy to burn the image file into a DVD.

To burn or mount the ISO-file I suggest that you download and use Ultraiso.
